actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-1576.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-1368.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to provide for the printing as a House document of the proceedings at the commemoration ceremony in honor of the 200th anniversary of the 1st Continental Congress.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides for the printing as a House document of proceedings at the commemoration ceremony in honor of the two hundredth anniversary of the First Continental Congress. Provides for the printing of 10,000 additional copies of such House documents for the use of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to provide for the printing as a House document of the proceedings at the commemoration ceremony in honor of the 200th anniversary of the 1st Continental Congress.
